wikipedia.title: Pollaczek–Khinchine formula

wikipedia.title: M/G/1 queue
wikipedia.summary: In queueing theory, a discipline within the mathematical theory of probability, an M/G/1 queue is a queue model where arrivals are Markovian (modulated by a Poisson process), service times have a General distribution and there is a single server.

q&a.title: M/GI/1 service time distribution
